mapper.select: select idx, fk_teamwon_idx, subject, content , to_char(startdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as startdate , to_char(lastdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as lastdate , fk_folder_idx, groupno, depth, category, status, importance , case when trunc(startdate) < sysdate and sysdate < trunc(lastdate)+1 then 1 when trunc(lastdate)+1 < sysdate then -1 else 0 end as dayCnt from tbl_folder where status = 1 start with fk_folder_idx = 0 connect by prior idx = fk_folder_idx order siblings by category asc
